channel.title: Business Analytics on Home
channel.description: Recent content in Business Analytics on Home

item.title: Why Most BI Dashboards Fail (And How to Fix Them)
item.description:
Most BI dashboards fail for one simple reason: they start with visuals, not decisions.

In many organizations, dashboards are treated as design exercises. The focus quickly shifts to charts, colors, and layouts, while the most important questions remain unanswered:

item.title: The Business Problems Every Data Analyst Needs to Master
item.description: When you start your journey as a data analyst, it’s tempting to think that acing SQL queries, building complex dashboards, or mastering every new BI tool is the key to success. After all, technical skills are visible, tangible, and measurable. But here’s the hard truth: technical skills alone won’t make you indispensable.
